column4: hi guys  i need help with matlab 6.5 r13 installation via wine, can someone help me out?
depends on the dir/file what are the current permissians,
thats what I get when I ls the parent directory of the folder I wanna samba-share
think that means owner = root, group = root & their rw perm is rwx
you seem to have read write and exe permissians for root, groups and others so i cant se it being a permissians issue,

right but (assuming i interpreted the ls-l o/p right that is) the only people that have rwx authorizations are 1. the owner = root 2.People in the group = root....im trying to share the folder while logged in a different account
others has read write exe permissans as well as group and owner, others is everyone else.
then why cant I share it?
i suspect it may be a ntfs permissians thing, can you share a parent and symlink the folder from there?
